marklogic.body: Thanks for your article. It is extremely unfortunate that over the last decade, the travel industry has had to deal with terrorism, SARS, tsunamis, bird Flu virus, swine Flu, as well as first ever true global economic depression. Through all this the industry has really proven to be powerful, resilient and dynamic, discovering new solutions to deal with misfortune. There are fresh difficulties and the possiblility to which the industry must again adapt and Act in response.
